com.atakmap.android.drawing.mapItems

Class DrawingCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.FilterMetaDataHolder
      • com.atakmap.android.maps.MapItem
        • com.atakmap.android.maps.Shape
          • com.atakmap.android.drawing.mapItems.DrawingCircle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, URIContent, HashtagContent, Capturable, Exportable, ParentMapItem, AnchoredMapItem, MapItem.OnGroupChangedListener, MetaDataHolder, PointMapItem.OnPointChangedListener, VisibilityListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RangeCircle

    public class DrawingCircle
extends Shape
implements Exportable, AnchoredMapItem, ParentMapItem, MapItem.OnGroupChangedListener, PointMapItem.OnPointChangedListener, android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener
    A circle with one or more rings, a center marker, and radius marker
